word: THE SECOND CHAPTER IS COMPOSED OF COUNSELS FROM THE PEN OF MRS. WHITE RELATING TO THE ATTITUDE THAT SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS SHOULD TAKE TOWARD LABOR ORGANIZATIONS. THIS MATERIAL WAS PUBLISHED IN 1946 AS SECTION II IN THE PAMPHLET COUNTRY LIVING. IT APPEARS HERE IN THIS PERMANENT FORM FOR CONTINUED AND PRAYERFUL STUDY.--WHITE TRUSTEES.
